PKGMAN-EDIT(8) System Manager's Manual PKGMAN-EDIT(8)

NAME

pkgman-edit — edit the package's file

SYNOPSIS

pkgman edit pkgname [file]

DESCRIPTION

Edit the package file from the package source directory using the editor specified in the EDITOR environment variable. If file is not specified, then Pkgfile is used.

ENVIRONMENT

If the following environment variable exists it will be utilized by pkgman(1):

EDITOR
If the package's source directory has a file, then pkgman-edit will try to open it using a EDITOR. If EDITOR is unset, then pkgman-edit will fail.

EXIT STATUS

0
if success
255
if environment variable EDITOR is unset or package source is not found
>0
EDITOR execution exit status
September 9, 2023 Zeppe-Lin
